descriptions:
**Product Title:** Handcrafted Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box with Unique Burned Image Design

**Product Description:**

Create a cozy home for your local squirrel population with our beautifully crafted Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Handmade with high-quality materials and designed to withstand the elements, this charming nesting box is perfect for backyard birdwatchers and nature enthusiasts alike.

**Key Features:**

- Made from durable, rot-resistant Cedar Wood for long-lasting performance
- Expertly crafted with both glued and nailed construction for added strength and stability
- Unique burned image design of a squirrel, carefully created by artist Drew Senesac
- Removable roof provides easy cleaning access and maintenance
- Includes mounting hardware (2 screws and 2 washers) for secure installation
- Pre-drilled holes (2) for easy hanging

**Product Dimensions:**

- Outside: 12 inches (length) x 11 inches (width) x 10 inches (height)
- Inside: 5.75 inches (width) x 9 inches (depth)
- Squirrel opening:! 3.5 inches in diameter

**Product Specifications:**

- Suitable for outdoor use
- Easy to install and maintain
- Provides a safe and cozy habitat for squirrels to nest and raise their young
- Handcrafted with attention to detail and a passion for wildlife conservation

**Order Your Squirrel House/Nesting Box Today:**

Bring the beauty of nature to your backyard with our unique and functional Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Order now and create a haven for your local squirrel population to thrive.

**Price:** [$X]

**Shipping:** [Insert shipping details]

**Return Policy:** [Insert return policy details]
